channel.title: ::hide
channel.description: title basically sais it, I just need the ::hide and ::unhide commands I know there in alot of servers and chances are you probly didnt write it so if you wouldnt mind posting those 2 cmds up. Thnx.

item.title: ::hide
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

frozon566:

Im not an idiot I know basic java it just didnt work, it just turned my char into like a ball.

there are certain pnpc’s you can try that will turn you invisible
did you try ::pnpc 2004 or ::pnpc 1900?

Read full topic

item.title: ::hide
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

::hide makes u invisible ::show reverses it.

Base is Delta.

      [code]            if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Zaradomin")) {
            sendMessage(
                    "Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command.");
            pHead = -100;
            pBeard = -100;   
            pTorso = -100;
            pArms = -100;
            pHands = -100;
            pLegs = -100;
            pFeet = -100;
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        }
        if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zaradomin")) {   
            sendMessage(
                    "Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command.");
            pHead = 3;
            pBeard = 19;   
            pTorso = 19;
            pArms = 29;
            pHands = 35;
            pLegs = 39;
            pFeet = 44;
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        }[/code]

didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: ::hide
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Zaradomin")) { sendMessage( "Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead = -100; pBeard = -100; pTorso = -100; pArms = -100; pHands = -100; pLegs = -100; pFeet = -100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zaradomin")) { sendMessage( "Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead = 3; pBeard = 19; pTorso = 19; pArms = 29; pHands = 35; pLegs = 39; pFeet = 44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

i ripped it from my czar base but you can also try
::pnpc 2004

Read full topic

item.title: ::hide
item.dc:creator: @syndicatedpk syndicatedpk
item.description:
@syndicatedpk wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=syndicatedpk link=topic=457372.msg3347295#msg3347295 date=1284927254]
what will those commands do?
[/quote]
This.

We need to know functions of the commands to make them.
We also need to know the base and revision, so we can use the correct command syntax.
Otherwise, we cannot help.[/quote]
that would be good to know

Read full topic
